document_data.name: Golden Road
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Golden Road''' was a trade road running from [[Arrabar]] in [[Chondath]] on the [[Vilhon Reach]] through [[Ormpetarr]] to [[Innarlith]] on the [[Lake of Steam]] and then on to [[Shaarmid]] and [[Kormul]] in the [[Shaar]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|58}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 53: Khôltar, Part 4, Our Tour Begins}}

The Golden Road connected with the [[Dunsel Trail]] at Shaarmid{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|83}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 63: Khôltar, Part 14, A Brief History of Khôltar, Part 1}} and with the [[Trader's Way]] at Kormul.
document_data.History: In [[1385 DR]] the [[spellplague]] created an area of extreme magical chaos known as the [[Plaguewrought Land]] over much of the northern area formerly traversed by the road.
